com.almasb.fxgl.asset

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.asset.AudioManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserProfileSavable, NotificationListener, WorldStateListener

    public final class AudioManager
extends Object
implements WorldStateListener, UserProfileSavable, NotificationListener
    Controls playback and the volume of Sound and Music.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

        global music volume

      • setGlobalMusicVolume

        public void setGlobalMusicVolume(double volume)
        Set global music volume in the range [0..1], where 0 = 0%, 1 = 100%
        Parameters:
        volume - music volume

      • globalSoundVolumeProperty

        Returns:
        global sound volume

      • setGlobalSoundVolume

        public void setGlobalSoundVolume(double volume)
        Set global sound volume in the range [0..1], where 0 = 0%, 1 = 100%
        Parameters:
        volume - sound volume

      • playSound

        public void playSound(Sound sound)
        Plays given sound based on its properties.
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to play

      • stopSound

        public void stopSound(Sound sound)
        Stops playing given sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to stop

      • stopAllSounds

        public void stopAllSounds()
        Stops playing all sounds.

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(Music music)
        Plays given music based on its properties.
        Parameters:
        music - music to play

      • pauseMusic

        public void pauseMusic(Music music)
        Pauses given music if it was previously started with playSound(Sound). It can then be restarted by resumeMusic(Music).
        Parameters:
        music - music to pause

      • resumeMusic

        public void resumeMusic(Music music)
        Resumes previously paused pauseMusic(Music) music.
        Parameters:
        music - music to resume

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic(Music music)
        Stops currently playing music. It cannot be restarted using resumeMusic(Music). The music object needs to be started again by playMusic(Music).
        Parameters:
        music - music to stop

      • pauseAllMusic

        public void pauseAllMusic()
        Pauses all currently playing music. These can be resumed using resumeAllMusic().

      • resumeAllMusic

        public void resumeAllMusic()
        Resumes all currently paused music.

      • stopAllMusic

        public void stopAllMusic()
        Stops all currently playing music. The music cannot be restarted by calling resumeAllMusic(). Each music object will need to be started by playMusic(Music).
